title: Our guide to every Week 15 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
content: Who can improve their chances of making the playoffs? And who is likely out? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 15 game.

title: Jets rookie Brady Cook gets first start vs. Jags
content: The New York Jets will turn to Brady Cook as their starter Sunday against the Jacksonville Jaguars, giving the rookie his first start in the NFL.

title: Bowles: Bucs' 'inexcusable' loss falls on players
content: Buccaneers coach Todd Bowles called Thursday night's 29-28 loss "inexcusable" and put the onus on his players to hold one another accountable and execute on the field.

title: Oilers trade for Pens' Jarry to solve issues in net
content: The Oilers have finally addressed their multiple-season problem in goal by acquiring Penguins netminder Tristan Jarry. Edmonton dealt goalie Stuart Skinner, defenseman Brett Kulak and a 2029 second-round pick for Jarry and forward Sam Poulin.

title: Vonn, 41, earns 1st WCup downhill win since 2018
content: Lindsey Vonn raced to a stunning fast win in a World Cup downhill to earn her first victory in nearly eight years -- and the first in her comeback with titanium implants in her right knee after a five-year retirement.

title: Kitchens out as OC after Heels offense slumps
content: North Carolina offensive coordinator Freddie Kitchens and special teams coordinator Mike Priefer will not return next season, with the school announcing the departure of both assistants after a 4-8 season in Bill Belichick's college coaching debut.

title: Johnson's Grand Slam Track files for bankruptcy
content: Grand Slam Track, the league fronted by sprinting great Michael Johnson, has filed for bankruptcy after canceling its final event and failing to pay athletes and vendors.

title: Fans slam FIFA 'betrayal' over WC ticket prices
content: Fans have accused FIFA of a "monumental betrayal" after latest prices for World Cup tickets began to circulate on Thursday.

title: Paul admits Benavidez on his boxers-to-avoid list
content: Jake Paul, who will face the toughest test of his boxing career when he fights Anthony Joshua on Dec. 19, admitted undefeated WBC light heavyweight champion David Benavidez is one fighter he'll avoid calling out.

content: After a spate of upsets, there are familiar teams but also some newcomers at the top of the FCS bracket.

content: Replacing legendary coach and mentor John Cook was just a step on her path to building a legend of her own.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Salah out, Elliott back at Liverpool in January?
content: Mohamed Salah's possible Liverpool exit could be offset by Harvey Elliott's return to Anfield in January. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: PF contributions on wages beyond ‚Çπ15,000 voluntary, says Labour Ministry
content: The Code on Social Security replaces the Employees‚Äô Provident Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952

title: Karnataka updates procedures for medical registration and certification linked to mandatory rural service

content: During Zero Hour in the Lok Sabha, K.C. Venugopal called on the government to release a commemorative coin and postage stamp to mark the centenary of the 1925 meeting

title: Thirupparankundram row: No evidence to establish stone pillar is a deepathoon, says T.N. govt.
content: Advocate General P.S. Raman, representing the State, referred to the previous judgments in connection to the issue. He pointed out there was no mention of the deepathoon in the orders on the suit filed in 1920 demarcating the portions belonging to the temple and the dargah

title: India should reassess resilience of its air defence systems purchased from Russia: U.K. weapons and military expert
content: Jack Watling, a specialist in land warfare at the Royal United Service Institute (RUSI), a thinktank in London, says India should reassess the resilience of Russian systems such as the S-400 missile defence system, though he does not suggest that India stop purchases of Russian weapons altogether.¬†Mr. Watling is the author of The Arms of the Future: Technology and Close Combat in the Twenty First Century and he works closely with the British military on assessments of the future operating environment. He has also worked with the Ukrainian armed forces and in North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) countries. Excerpts of the interview with minor edits for readability:¬†

title: Government likely to rename MGNREGS to ‚ÄòPujya Bapu Gramin Rozgar Yojana‚Äô

title: Kozhikode Corporation Council bids farewell as term nears end
content: The current council will stay in office until the new one takes charge, possibly before December 20; Mayor Beena Philip highlighted the council‚Äôs achievements over five years, while opposition councillors voiced regret over projects that had stalled

title: SC says PMGKY insurance applies to requisitioned COVID-19 doctors
content: Supreme Court judgment affirms requisition of doctors and health workers during COVID-19 for PMGKY insurance claims

title: Court calls for fair reporting of court proceedings
content: When the court convened on Friday to decide on the quantum of punishment for the convicts in the 2017 actor rape case, an exasperated Honey M. Varghese, the Principal Sessions Judge, suggested fair reporting of court proceedings and balanced comments without slandering the judicial system

title: Watch: Novo Nordisk brings Ozempic to India for type 2 diabetes treatment

Ozempic is now available in India as 0.25 mg, 0.5 mg and 1 mg in ‚ÄòFlexTouch Pen‚Äô - an easy-to-use, once-weekly pen device.

title: SC seeks Centre‚Äôs response on plea to declare cancer a nationwide notifiable disease

The petition also flags ‚Äòchronic and severe under-reporting‚Äô of cases and promotion of misinformation such as ‚Äòcow urine as cancer cure‚Äô.

content: Preliminary information suggests the fire originated in the hotel's pantry, where a refrigerator, gas stove and a cylinder were kept

title: At IFFK opening, ripples of actor assault case
content: 30th edition of film festival gets under way with Kerala Culture Minister expressing solidarity with the survivor in the actor assault case. Referring to the opening film Palestine 36, he says the State stands with the oppressed people of Palestine.

title: Railways to deploy 5,000 ex-servicemen as pointsmen amid staff shortage
content: Ex-servicemen to be recruited on a short-term contractual basis; move comes amid stiff resistance from trade unions, and a CRS recommendation against contractual staff¬†in safety-critical roles

content: "There has been a 43% decrease in airfares when you consider the Consumer Price Index (CPI), inflation...," he said in Parliament

title: Study flags sector-specific gaps in India‚Äôs ESG push
content: Collaborative research by Kerala University and the Indian Institute of Forest Management, Bhopal, publishes the findings

title: Veligonda project works on track, to finish by 2026, says Minister
content: Nimmala Rama Naidu says another ‚Çπ4,000 crore will be required to complete the ongoing works as well as the distributary canals; while 45,000 cubic meters of hard rock work is yet to be done in the feeder canal, over 28,000 cubic meters of work has been completed

title: Major fronts are expecting a stunning victory in Idukki
content: While UDF is hoping to reclaim its stronghold, LDF is expecting to continue its 2020 local body election victory in the district. NDA too is hoping to deepen its influence

title: National Waterway-104 project still in nascent stage, says Union Minister
content: No funds have been allocated, released, or utilised for the development of NW-104 in the last five years, Union Minister Sarbananda Sonowal tells Lok Sabha

title: All set for vote counting across 25 centres in Thrissur
content: LDF banks on a decade of development; UDF senses anti-incumbency wave; NDA claims edge in low-turnout Corporation battle

title: Actor rape case convicts get 20 years rigorous imprisonment
content: The six convicts awarded life imprisonment on two counts for gang rape (IPC 376 D) and criminal conspiracy [IPC 120 (b)] among other punishments. All the punishments of the convicts will run concurrently. The number of days they were imprisoned during the pendency of the trial will be deducted from the 20-year jail term, the court announced

title: Watch: Pulsar Suni and five others convicted, sentenced to 20 years in Kerala actor assault case
content: Pulsar Suni and five others in the 2017 Kerala actor abduction and sexual assault case were sentenced to 20 years of rigorous imprisonment. Each was fined ‚Çπ50,000, and the survivor was awarded ‚Çπ5 lakh. The Ernakulam Special Court held all six guilty of conspiracy, kidnapping, and gang rape. Judge Honey M. Varghese said the case did not warrant the maximum sentence. The ruling came three days after Malayalam actor Dileep was acquitted.

title: State aiding land scams and illegal leases, alleges CPI(M)
content: Nearly 248 acres of public land in Vijayawada, valued at over ‚Çπ5,825 crore, has been leased out or encroached upon with the support of the NDA leaders, the CPI(M) alleges

title: Ozempic now available in India
content: Ozempic, a once-weekly injectable formulation of semaglutide‚Äîis approved in India for adults with type 2 diabetes as the first line treatment, adjunct to diet and exercise

content: ‚ÄúThe AI tool will increase the efficiency of policing and reduce the turnaround time of investigation by 80%,‚Äù says Microsoft team

content: Minutes after the House convened for the day, the Opposition pointed out that there was no Cabinet Minister present, which they called ‚Äòinsult to the House‚Äô

title: High security in place to ensure peaceful counting in Kozhikode
content: The support of more than 7,000 police officers will be ensured across the district to maintain law and order

title: Anganwadi workers in Andhra Pradesh stage protest seeking redress of their grievances
content: Besides a rise in wages, they are seeking implementation of gratuity and increase in menu charges for mothers and children

title: KTR hails good show by BRS-backed candidates in GP polls
content: Party leader Jagadish Reddy‚Äôs father elected Sarpanch of Nagaram village in Suryapet district at the age of 95

title: Six bodies recovered so far from site of Arunachal accident, many still missing
content: All those travelling in the vehicle were labourers from Assam's Tezpur district. The accident happened on the evening of December 8, around 40 km from Hayuliang towards Chaglagam.

title: Ten (maybe 11) players to watch at NCAA volleyball tournament's Sweet 16
content: the 2025 NCAA volleyball tournament is down to its final 16 teams . can Nebraska, the no. 1 overall seed, finish undefeated and claim the program's sixth national title? will Kentucky return to the final four for the first time since winning its first national championship in 2020?

title: Five players who offer upside for your lineup in Week 15
content: fantasy managers should consider starting Jauan Jennings in Week 15 . the playoffs already rolling in ESPN standard leagues and plenty of formats kicking off their tournaments this week . think big-play chops here and favorable deployment based on the week 15 slate of games .

title: Bucs' Creamsicles, Falcons' throwbacks top Week 15 uniforms
content: the Steelers will wear a color rush look on "Monday Night Football" against the Miami Dolphins . the color rush outfit will be worn on the road against the olympics on "Thursday night football"

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: the 2025 winter meetings didn't have a $700 million-plus deal like last year . but there were still a number of impactful free agent signings . veteran slugger Kyle Schwarber chose to return to the Philadelphia Phillies on a five-year deal in the first major splash of the meetings .

title: Devendra Fadnavis Praises Prada Pact As Big Win For Maharashtra Artisans
content: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis has praised the agreement between Global luxury brand Prada and state-owned bodies LIDCOM & LIDKAR as not just a demand for credit but a command for a business partnership.

title: Porn Star Bonnie Blue To Be Deported From Bali After $12 Fine
content: Controversial British adult film star Bonnie Blue will be deported from Indonesia's Bali island, an immigration official said Friday, after earlier receiving a small fine for traffic violations.

title: Israel Strikes Lebanon, Army Claims Targets Were Hezbollah Sites
content: A series of Israeli strikes hit south and east Lebanon on Friday, state media reported, as Israel's army said it was targeting Hezbollah sites, the latest such raids despite a year-old ceasefire.

title: Turkey Says No Change In Russian S-400 Fleet Amid Talks With US For F-35s
content: Turkey and the United States are discussing the US sanctions and obstacles to Ankara rejoining the F-35 jet programme but nothing has changed with respect to its possession of Russian S-400 air defences, the defence ministry said on Friday.

title: Trump, Bill Clinton In New Photos Retrieved From Jefferey Epstein's Estate
content: Democratic lawmakers on the House Oversight Committee released 19 photos out of the 95,000 they received from the estate of Epstein, who died in jail in 2019 while awaiting sex trafficking charges.

title: Conspiracy, Motive, In Zubeen Murder Established: Himanta Sharma
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has said the motive and criminal conspiracy has been clearly tracked and it has been examined by Advocate General.

title: "A Personal Plea": Imran Khan Ex-Wife Jemima Goldsmith's Letter To Elon Musk
content: Jemima Goldsmith, the ex-wife of former Pakistani prime minister Imran Khan, publicly appealed to X owner Elon Musk on Friday, alleging that her posts about Khan's situation are being suppressed on the platform.

title: "Peace, Understanding, Reconciliation": President Murmu's Message To Manipur
content: President Droupadi Murmu today reminded the people of Manipur that the strength of the "beautiful land" they call home lies in its diversity.

title: 2023 Nobel Peace Prize Winner Narges Mohammadi "Violently" Arrested In Iran
content: Iranian security forces on Friday "violently" arrested the 2023 Nobel Peace Prize winner Narges Mohammadi at a memorial ceremony for a lawyer who died earlier this month, her supporters said.

title: "Very Well Made": Mehbooba Mufti's Daughter Iltija Mufti Praises Dhurandhar
content: Iltija Mufti, daughter of former Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Mehbooba Mufti, took to her social media to share her thoughts on the recently released film 'Dhurandhar'.

title: He Was Depressed Over Ex-Wife's Move To UK, Then He Died By Suicide
content: The woman said she never wanted to go abroad and was forced by her husband to take the IELTS and go abroad.

title: Woman, 2 Sons Found Dead In Delhi Home, Suicide Suspected: Cops
content: A woman and her two sons were found dead at their home in southeast Delhi on Friday, with police suspecting it to be a case of suicide, an official said.

title: Red Terror Nears Its End As Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra Maoist-Free
content: In a landmark development, Madhya Pradesh and Maharashtra, two key states in the Red Corridor, have officially declared themselves Maoist-free, signalling a decisive collapse of the Maoist stronghold that once dominated central India.

title: Cabinet Clears SHANTI Bill To Allow Private Players In Nuclear Energy Field
content: The Union Cabinet chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi has approved the Atomic Energy Bill, 2025, branded as SHANTI - Sustainable Harnessing and Advancement of Nuclear Energy for Transforming India.

title: Can't Cap Airfares For Entire Year, Aviation Minister Tells Parliament
content: Civil Aviation Minister K Ram Mohan Naidu told the Lok Sabha today that the government cannot impose fare caps for an entire year, citing seasonal fluctuations in demand and operational realities of the aviation sector.

title: Video: After 40-Minute Wait, Pakistan PM Gatecrashes Putin's Closed-Door Meeting
content: According to a video shared by RT India, Sharif ended up walking into a closed-door meeting between Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan after his own scheduled bilateral with the Russian leader was delayed.

title: Armed Jaish Terrorist Arrested In J&K While Trying To Infiltrate Border
content: A Jaish-e-Mohammed terrorist armed with an AK rifle was arrested by the Border Security Force (BSF) in Jammu and Kashmir's Akhnoor sector on Friday while he was trying to infiltrate the border.

title: Does Sanchar Saathi Spy On You? What The App's Forensic Analysis Shows
content: NDTV's Open-Source Intelligence team, in collaboration with cybersecurity engineer Aseem Shrey, conducted a forensic analysis on the app's Android 10 version using decompilation.

title: Red Fort Blast: Delhi Court Sends 3 Doctors, Preacher To 12 Days Jail
content: A Delhi court on Friday remanded three doctors and a preacher who were arrested in connection with the November 10 Red Fort blast case to 12 days of judicial custody.

title: Displaced Gazans Face Floods Amid Heavy Rains, Supply Blockage: UN
content: Hundreds of thousands of displaced Gazans face flooding of their tents and shelters by heavy rains, and materials for shelters and sandbags are not being allowed to enter the enclave, the UN International Organization for Migration said on Friday.

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus fantasy hockey panic or patience
content: a panel of ESPN fantasy hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . it's not too late to join ESPN Fantasy Hockey , with new leagues starting every Monday .

title: Men's class rankings: USC into top 10; Tennessee and Texas A&M join
content: the biggest winner of this most recent update was USC . both of their signees made enormous leaps in the player rankings . the Trojans jumped from no. 24 all the way to no. 9 despite not adding any commitments .

title: Power Rankings: The 4-team race for No. 1
content: four teams had a legitimate case to be no. 1 in this week's Power Rankings . Michigan took the top spot thanks to the Wolverines' dominance at the Players Era Festival in Las Vegas . Arizona was our No. 1 team heading into Feast Week after the Wildcats knocked off UConn .

title: As responsibilities evolve, MLB manager salaries still lag behind top coaches in other sports
content: Pat Murphy and Stephen Vogt both won manager of the year for the first time in 2024 . the two became just the second managers in each league to win the award in back-to-back seasons . this year, they became the first managers in a row to receive the award .

title: We made score picks for every postseason CFB game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: The most impactful women's recruit on every 2026 top-25 class roster
content: a look at the most impactful signee in each of the nation's top recruiting classes . the top scouts have a clearer picture of what next season will look like for many of them . last year, no one has done star power like USC coach Lindsay Gottlieb .

title: Connelly's alt-college football awards: Catch of the Year, 'Dog in Him' and more
content: the 2025 Heisman trophy is the culmination of college football's awards week . the 222-yard performance was the hoosiers' historic 13-10 win over Ohio State in the Big Ten championship last weekend . 'the heisman has been a great success,' says a columnist .

title: Classic matchup, new engine: How to bet on Army-Navy
content: this year's matchup between Army and Navy feels ready to break formation . every season gives us a familiar script, yet something about this game hints that the usual path might not hold . this year has a different engine, but it's worth looking at what drives the numbers underneath .

title: The NFL's best player through 14 games is ...? Barnwell stacks MVP candidates, picks winner
content: quarterbacks Drake Maye and Matthew Stafford have a clear top two for MVP in the betting market . there's still enough time left in the season for that to shift if another candidate gets hot and leads his team to a division title or a top seed in the conference down the stretch .

title: Rupee at historic low: How 9% real depreciation could reshape India‚Äôs economy - explained
content: The Indian rupee is experiencing a significant decline against the US dollar, which could impact inflation, exports, and corporate margins. While short-term effects are challenging, a weaker rupee could boost long-term growth by encouraging domestic production and improving export competitiveness. Experts anticipate this trend may continue due to trade deal uncertainties and capital flow pressures.

title: Zubeen Garg death: 4 charged with murder; singer's cousin accused of culpable homicide
content: A Special Investigation Team has charged four individuals with murder in the Zubeen Garg death case. The singer's cousin, a suspended Assam Police officer, faces charges of culpable homicide not amounting to murder. Two personal security officers are accused of criminal breach of trust. This development follows the singer's death in Singapore, where local police initially found no foul play.

title: SMAT: Match-fixing scandal hits domestic cricket; 4 players suspended
content: Assam Cricket Association has suspended four players with immediate effect following allegations of involvement in corrupt practices during the Syed Mushtaq Ali T20 Trophy. The players are accused of attempting to instigate current team members for fixing. The BCCI's Anti-Corruption and Security Unit conducted an inquiry, leading to criminal proceedings and an FIR against the accused.

title: Pak PM 'humiliated': After 40-min wait, Sharif 'gatecrashes' Putin-Erdogan meet - watch
content: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif reportedly "gatecrashed" a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan after waiting over 40 minutes. This incident occurred as Sharif continues efforts to strengthen ties with Moscow, despite acknowledging Russia's close partnership with India.

title: Microsoft AI CEO opens up: 'Told to quit school at 16' - Suleyman on working-class life
content: Microsoft AI chief Mustafa Suleyman reveals his working-class London upbringing shaped his tech vision. The DeepMind co-founder, whose Syrian taxi driver father and nurse mother urged him to learn a trade, lived independently from age 16 before dropping out of Oxford to help Muslim youth post-9/11. Now he champions AI for social good and universal basic income.

title: 'Sanskrit ours too': Pak varsity launches course; Mahabharat, Gita on the cards
content: In a historic move, Pakistan's Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS) has introduced a Sanskrit course, marking a significant first since partition.  The curriculum includes Hindu epics like the Mahabharata and Gita.  Academics emphasize Sanskrit's regional unifying role and aim to foster local scholarship on ancient texts, previously dominated by foreign researchers.

title: 'Main Bihar se hoon': Vaibhav Sooryavanshi hits back at UAE sledging
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi smashed an incredible 171 off 95 balls, including fourteen sixes, setting a new U-19 world record in India's 433/6 against UAE. The 14-year-old's dominant innings, marked by a witty exchange with the wicketkeeper, propelled India to a commanding position.  His performance also secured a tournament record for most sixes in a single U-19 Asia Cup innings.

title: From Top Gun to Marvel: How Hollywood mastered the art of propaganda
content: Much like the morality of art, it is absolutely futile to discuss whether a piece of art is ‚Äúpropaganda‚Äù ‚Äì but that hasn‚Äôt stopped critics from convulsing in unison over Aditya Dhar‚Äôs magnum opus Dhurandhar. The title track of the movie contains the line: ‚ÄúLadies and gentlemen, you are not ready for this.‚Äù

title: GPU cooling row: Nvidia employee objects to Microsoft's system; company responds
content: An Nvidia employee flagged Microsoft's data center cooling for its new Blackwell GPUs as "wasteful." While Microsoft uses liquid cooling for the chips, a building-wide air cooling system reportedly consumes significant energy. This highlights the ongoing debate over energy and water usage in AI infrastructure, with Microsoft aiming for carbon neutrality.

title: 'Pressure will pile': Gill's form under scrutiny; ex-cricketer asks Samson to 'be ready'
content: Former India cricketer Irfan Pathan believes Shubman Gill is under immense pressure due to his recent T20I struggles, with the T20 World Cup approaching. Pathan emphasized that Gill must score runs to secure his place, especially with Sanju Samson waiting in the wings. Gill's form is crucial for the team's powerplay starts and his leadership role.

title: Delhi‚Äôs school fee law goes live: What changes for parents and schools this academic year
content: Delhi's new education act aims to curb arbitrary private school fee hikes. The law mandates itemized fee heads, caps on certain charges, and prohibits disguised capitation fees. User-based services must be no-profit, no-loss. A School-Level Fee Regulation Committee, including parents, will now approve fee structures, ensuring transparency and predictability for three years.

title: Ayesha Curry‚Äôs mother-daughter night out subtly counters Stephen Curry rumor
content: Ayesha Curry recently shared a heartwarming mother-daughter outing with her daughters Riley and Ryan, attending a concert by their favorite K-pop-inspired group, KATSEYE. Stephen Curry also shared the post on his Instagram story, highlighting the family's enjoyment of the event. The popular six-member group, formed from Netflix's Pop Star Academy, is currently on their 'Beautiful Chaos Tour'.

title: SpaceX may go public in 2026: Can be ‚Äògood news‚Äô for Google; $100 bn gain expected
content: Google's investment in Elon Musk's SpaceX could yield a staggering $111 billion if the rocket company goes public next year as planned. SpaceX's successful Starlink venture has already boosted Google's finances, with an $8 billion gain reported earlier this year. The potential IPO, valued at $1.

title: 'Something wrong in HC': SC scraps plea on Karur stampede probe; warns TN govt
content: The Supreme Court rejected Tamil Nadu's plea to modify its order suspending the state's inquiry commission and SIT probe into the Karur stampede. Emphasizing fairness, the bench also criticized a Madras High Court report on a writ petition's registration. The court previously ordered a CBI investigation and a supervisory committee.

title: PM Modi, Gill, fashion show: Messi's India tour has everything but football
content: Lionel Messi is set to visit India for the 'GOAT India Tour 2025', his first trip since 2011, but this time without any competitive matches. The tour focuses on promotional events and appearances across Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and New Delhi, including meetings with dignitaries and a charity fashion show.

title: Usain Bolt & Kasi Bennett net worth 2025: Career, family, business
content: Sprint legend Usain Bolt, estimated at $90 million net worth in 2025, continues to thrive post-retirement through endorsements and business ventures. His partner, Kasi Bennett, a model and entrepreneur, supports his endeavors while maintaining a private life. Together, they focus on their three children, balancing global success with family values.

title: Paige Shiver net worth: 55% salary hike and Sherrone Moore link spark buzz
content: University of Michigan football is in turmoil as executive assistant Paige Shiver faces intense public scrutiny. Her name is linked to former coach Sherrone Moore's firing and police detainment due to alleged inappropriate relationship rumors. Shiver's recent significant salary increase and social media silence have fueled speculation amid the ongoing investigation.

title: Clint Frazier warns $8.2bn Yankees after Edwin D√≠az signs with loaded Dodgers
content: Former Yankee Clint Frazier voiced concerns over the team's free agency strategy. He believes the Yankees are losing their competitive edge while the Dodgers are strengthening their roster. Frazier highlighted the loss of pitcher Edwin Diaz to the Dodgers as a prime example.

title: Red Fort blast probe: NIA raids Hazaribag home of 'ISIS operative'; gadgets, documents scanned
content: In the early hours, Hazaribag was the scene of a high-stakes NIA operation at the residence of Shahnawaz Alam, a known ISIS operative currently imprisoned in Pune. This raid, part of an investigation into the recent Red Fort bombing in Delhi, focused on uncovering extremist materials and digital devices.

title: Which GenAI courses became India‚Äôs top choice in 2025 amid soaring AI demand?
content: India witnessed a surge in GenAI learning in 2025, with Coursera reporting over 3.6 million enrolments, the highest globally. Learners explored courses ranging from introductory AI to specialised GenAI skills, including prompt engineering, LLM applications, and AI workflow automation. Top-ranked programmes came from Google Cloud, IBM, AWS, Vanderbilt University, and DeepLearning.AI. Key skills focused on automation workflows, data literacy, cybersecurity, and problem solving. The trend reflects India‚Äôs growing preparation for AI-driven careers and an AI-ready workforce.

title: From ages 8 to 18: How an all-girl team is taking free chess to rural India
content: The evolution of the chess queen finds a parallel in rural India, where the ‚ÄúCheckmate Betul‚Äù initiative, launched by US-based Avika Shukla, offers free, structured chess training to girls with no prior access. The programme, run by an all-girl global team, is helping students gain confidence, focus and new skills while overcoming significant logistical hurdles.

title: New power bloc: Trump may be ditching G7 for new 'Core-5'; which countries are on list
content: Reports suggest Donald Trump is considering a new "Core-5" bloc including China and Russia, a stark contrast to his previous stance. This idea, though unconfirmed, aligns with his transactional approach to foreign policy. The proposal emerges amidst ongoing trade tensions and follows a recent call between PM Modi and Trump.

title: 'Cricketers indulge in vices during overseas tours': Ravindra Jadeja's wife claims
content: Ravindra Jadeja's wife, Rivaba, has sparked discussion by alleging that some Indian cricketers engage in vices during overseas tours, while asserting her husband remains untouched by such activities. She highlighted that players often act freely away from public scrutiny, but Jadeja, understanding his responsibilities, avoids these temptations. Her remarks have gained traction online.

title: 'DKS will be CM ...': Cong MLA reignites rumours; confirms dy CM hosted dinner
content: Karnataka Congress MLA Iqbal Hussain claimed Deputy Chief Minister D K Shivakumar will become chief minister after the ongoing winter session, fueling speculation of a leadership change. Hussain, who attended a dinner with legislators, stated Shivakumar's elevation is due to his efforts and party contributions, with the high command to make the final decision.

title: Triple H & Stephanie McMahon net worth 2025: WWE careers and business ventures
content: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon's combined net worth is estimated at $500 million in 2025, reflecting their significant contributions to WWE's corporate and creative success. Their leadership in talent development, branding, and strategic expansion has built a strong financial foundation and continues to shape WWE's future identity and growth under TKO.

title: 'World War 3!' Trump makes explosive claim; frustrated over Russia-Ukraine war
content: President Trump issued a grave warning about the Russia-Ukraine war, fearing it could escalate into a third world war. He expressed deep frustration with stalled peace talks, urging an immediate halt to fighting. European leaders are now stepping in to shape negotiations, while battlefield pressures mount. Trump insists swift action is crucial to prevent a wider global conflict.

title: Watch: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi turns eagle, grabs sharp catch after 171-run knock in U19 Asia Cup 2025
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi starred with a record-shattering 171 and a spectacular diving catch as India U19 began their Asia Cup campaign with an overwhelming 234-run victory over UAE. Sooryavanshi's explosive batting, supported by strong partnerships, propelled India to a massive 433/6. The UAE chase faltered early, with only skipper Uddish Suri offering significant resistance.

title: Census 2027: Govt allocates Rs 11,700 cr; headcount to begin from April
content: India's upcoming census in 2027, costing Rs 11,700 crore, will be the nation's first fully digital exercise. Conducted in two phases from April 2026 to February 2027, it will cover housing and population, including social status and caste details. This significant undertaking is also projected to create one crore employment opportunities.

title: Pete Alonso‚Äôs Orioles deal sparks emotional farewell message from wife Haeley
content: Pete Alonso's five-year, $155 million deal with the Baltimore Orioles marks a significant career shift, concluding his time with the New York Mets. His wife, Haeley Alonso, shared a heartfelt reflection on their seven years in New York, cherishing memories from his 2019 rookie season and expressing gratitude for the city and its fans.

title: Game Awards 2025: Leon S Kennedy returns as Tomb Raider and Star Wars revive
content: The Game Awards 2025 saw Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 dominate with Game of the Year and a surprise DLC launch. The show also featured major reveals like Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic, new Tomb Raider titles, and Capcom's confirmation of Leon S. Kennedy in Resident Evil Requiem.

title: IndiGo crisis: External expert to identify root cause of chaos; more trouble for airline
content: IndiGo has appointed an external aviation specialist to investigate recent flight disruptions caused by non-compliance with new crew duty norms. The airline's parent company established a crisis management group after large-scale operational breakdowns. The expert will conduct a root cause analysis and identify improvement opportunities.

title: Nitish Reddy takes hat-trick in SMAT; dismisses RCB captain - Watch
content: Nitish Kumar Reddy took a hat-trick for Andhra in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy against Madhya Pradesh, reducing them to 14 for 3. Despite Reddy's bowling heroics, MP recovered with a crucial partnership to secure a four-wicket victory. Reddy's hat-trick marked the first of the current tournament season.

title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce calls reveal intimate early-romance moments
content: Taylor Swift's new docuseries, "The End of an Era," offers an intimate look at her relationship with Travis Kelce before a major Eras Tour stop.  Early phone calls reveal their comfort, humor, and mutual support, showcasing playful exchanges and deep affection that defined their connection as the tour progressed.

title: India-China thaw: Centre fast-tracks business visas; Beijing hails move
content: India has expedited business visa procedures for Chinese professionals, a move aimed at boosting bilateral relations and addressing skilled technician shortages. This development follows statements from Chinese officials expressing willingness to enhance personnel exchanges and work towards resolving border tensions with India.

title: 'Tamil Nadu govt anti-Sanatan': Big BJP, DMK face-off in LS; uproar over Deepam row
content: BJP leader Anurag Thakur accused the Tamil Nadu government of an "anti-Sanatan" stance over the Karthigai Deepam dispute. The state government defied Madras High Court orders to light a ceremonial lamp at Thiruparankundram temple, leading to contempt proceedings and protests. The government has appealed to the Supreme Court.

title: Still searching for success: Delhi Capitals hunt for opener, pacer at IPL Auction
content: Delhi Capitals, despite a strong start last season, faltered and missed playoffs. Ahead of the IPL auction with Rs 21.80 crore, they aim to fill key gaps, particularly for an explosive opener and death-bowling overseas pacers, while retaining a stable core. Nitish Rana‚Äôs arrival could also prove significant for their middle order.

title: Retail inflation: CPI inflation rises to 0.71% in November; up from 0.25% in October
content: Headline inflation rose to 0.71% in November 2025. The rural sector experienced increases in both headline and food inflation for November 2025.

title: Harvard gastroenterologist recommends: 10 best dinner combos for a healthier gut and liver
content: Evening meals significantly impact gut and liver health. Dr. Sethi highlights simple food pairings like turmeric with black pepper and yogurt with berries that aid digestion and reduce inflammation. Opting for light, colourful, whole-food dinners allows the liver to function smoothly, preventing fatigue and puffiness. Ten easy dinner combinations are provided to support a healthier liver and gut.

title: Shubman Gill's T20I form a concern? Gujarat Titans head coach Ashish Nehra 'not worried'
content: Shubman Gill‚Äôs inconsistent T20I run has sparked criticism, but Gujarat Titans head coach Ashish Nehra remains unfazed, backing his captain to regain form. In a wide-ranging chat, Nehra also praises Washington Sundar‚Äôs all-round growth, dismisses trade rumours, and outlines GT‚Äôs flexible approach ahead of the mini-auction with a largely settled core.

title: 'Unable to meet Rahul for 3 yrs': Ex-Cong MLA vents over leadership 'disconnect'; BJP piles on
content: An ex-Congress MLA from Odisha has urged Sonia Gandhi to replace party president Mallikarjun Kharge with younger leaders like Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, citing the party's disconnect with youth. The BJP highlighted this internal rift, suggesting a power struggle between 'Team Rahul' and 'Team Priyanka' is now evident within the Congress.

title: Silver prices cross Rs 2 lakh mark! MCX Silver futures hit all-time high
content: Silver prices surged past Rs 2 lakh per kg on Friday, hitting an all-time high driven by strong investor interest and favorable global markets. Experts foresee further gains due to international factors, manufacturing demand, and a weaker rupee.

title: Exclusive | Hetmyer: ‚ÄòConversations with Russell and Pollard helped me become a better six-hitter‚Äô
content: Shimron Hetmyer says elite six-hitters focus on staying still, holding their shape, and keeping their eyes locked on the ball. He further explains how training begins with basics: ground strokes, singles, twos, and timing. Only after mastering balance and position do players expand into power-hitting.

title: Watch: At 70 feet, 'world's largest Messi statue' erected in Kolkata ahead of GOAT tour
content: Kolkata is buzzing with anticipation for Lionel Messi's arrival on December 13th. A massive 70-foot statue of the football star has been built. Preparations are in full swing at Salt Lake stadium for the event. Fans are eagerly awaiting Messi's return to the city after 14 years. The atmosphere is electric as the city prepares for a memorable occasion.

title: MGNREGA to be renamed again? Govt to float proposal; to allocate Rs 1.51L cr for scheme
content: The Union Cabinet is reportedly set to approve renaming the MGNREGA to Pujya Bapu Gramin Rojgar Yojna. The government plans to introduce a bill guaranteeing 125 days of work annually to the rural poor, with an allocation of Rs 1.51 lakh crore.
